dmca.title: Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Sally Jennings [mailto:english99tutor@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 11:14 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Violation

 

Hi, 
I own and run a website for English as a Second Language learning at
www.speak-read-write.com <http://www.speak-read-write.com/> . I have
copyright statements on all the pages of my site. 

A site you serve, www.teslcafe.com <http://www.teslcafe.com/>  has
stolen a page of my site and republished it without permission or
credit. 

We have blocked their link to my mp3 (a reading of the page) in our
.htaccess file today. 

Their page posting the material they stole from me is
http://www.teslcafe.com/node/44 

My page showing this material as mine is
http://www.speak-read-write.com/sympathy.html 

Thanks for doing whatever you can about this. 

Sally Jennings 
www.speak-read-write.com <http://www.speak-read-write.com/>  
(604)435-3306
english99tutor@yahoo.com




  

________________________________

Everyone is raving about the all-new Yahoo! Mail beta.
<http://us.rd.yahoo.com/evt=45083/*http:/advision.webevents.yahoo.com/ma
ilbeta>
